name: Swarm of Rats
description: A medium swarm comprised of numerous tiny rats, typically found in filthy environments.
memorable: Its ability to spread disease and overwhelm foes with sheer numbers makes it particularly threatening.
goals: To swarm and overwhelm intruders or scavange for food.
relations: Often encountered in urban areas or dungeons where filth and decay are present.
environment: Urban settings, dungeons, or anywhere with debris and refuse.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage; can move through small openings.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class make it vulnerable to strong attacks.
attacks: Bites attack that inflicts piercing damage and can spread disease.
most_powerful_ability: Swarm Resilience gives it resistance to many types of damage and immunity to conditions.
senses: Heightened Smell ability provides a Perception score of 15 based on smell, allowing it to detect prey effectively.
additional_information: Accustomed to filth grants advantage on saving throws against diseases.
Swarm ability allows for movement through occupied spaces.
Can inflict rat plague disease with its bite.
